environment_variables.PBS_NODEFILE: The file containing the list of nodes that the job is running on
environment_variables.PBS_O_HOST: The host from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_O_QUEUE: The queue from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_QUEUE: The queue on which the job is running
environment_variables.PBS_O_WORKDIR: The working directory from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_ENVIRONMENT: The execution mode of the job
environment_variables.PBS_O_HOME: The home directory from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_O_PATH: The PATH environment variable from which the job was submitted
environment_variables.PBS_ARRAYID: The array ID of the job
environment_variables.LIST: The list of samples being processed
environment_variables.intersect_regions_ref: The reference file containing the target regions
